entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
